T02D3069:153a-0: @153a # // 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug

T02D3069:158a-38: drang ba'i gnas 'og min la sogs par gnas pa

T02D3069:159a-2: mchod rten khyad par 'khor gtogs pa //

T02D3069:159a-29: pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa de dag so sor gdan
T02D3069:159a-31: chos don kun gyi dkyil 'khor du //

T02D3069:159b-7: chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la bskyod pa med //
T02D3069:159b-8: rin chen lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang //
T02D3069:159b-9: sa'am chu'am 'on te bar snang la //

T02D3069:160b-22: bsod nams ye shes sku lnga mthar phyin pa //

T02D3069:160b-26: bdag gzhan don gyi snying por 'di phul bas //
T02D3069:160b-27: 'gro la phan phyir tshul khrims mchog ldan te //
T02D3069:160b-28: rin chen gter las kun la phan 'dogs shog / bde gshegs kun bzang mngon par sangs rgyas te //
T02D3069:160b-29: rdo rje gdan la mngon par bzhugs pa na //
T02D3069:160b-30: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyis gus bcas pa //
T02D3069:160b-31: sngags grub rgyal pos yungs kar phul ba ltar //
T02D3069:160b-32: deng 'dir ston pas bdud bzhi tshar bcad nas //
T02D3069:160b-33: skye rga na 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las //
T02D3069:160b-34: bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro ba kun bsgral nas //
T02D3069:160b-35: rdo rje gdan la mngon par snags rgyas shog /
T02D3069:160b-36: bkra shis shing zhal dro zhing byin phebs shing 'jig
T02D3069:160b-37: rten du yun ring por bzhugs su gsol ba /
T02D3069:160b-38: bde gshegs kun bzang mthong bas bkra shis ltar //
T02D3069:161a-0: @161a * // rgyal sras 'khor bcas deng 'dir bkra shis shog / ngan sdig log pa'i tshogs rnams bcom gyur nas //
T02D3069:161a-1: rgyal sras rig 'dzin tshogs rnams 'phel dar zhing //
T02D3069:161a-2: zhal mthong tsam gyis bde ba'i mchog brnyes nas //
T02D3069:161a-3: nyi ltar zhal dro zla ltar 'od gsal zhing //
T02D3069:161a-4: bdag dang 'gro la zhal dro byin che nas //
T02D3069:161a-5: bskal pa mthar thug bar du bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3069:161a-6: spyan dbye ba'i smon lam du gsol ba /
T02D3069:161a-7: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3069:161a-8: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol te /
T02D3069:161a-13: sman chab kyis sku khrus gsol bas bdag dang mtha'
T02D3069:161a-14: yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog
T02D3069:161a-15: ba'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang /
T02D3069:161a-16: dug gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dag nas
T02D3069:161a-17: rnam par dag pa'i sku dang ldan par gyur cig
T02D3069:161a-18: / aargha gsol bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems
T02D3069:161a-19: can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa dag ste
T02D3069:161a-20: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa
T02D3069:161a-21: thob par gyur cig / dri chab kyis sku la
T02D3069:161a-22: gtor te byugs pas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems
T02D3069:161a-23: can thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi chu'i g-yeng ba'i
T02D3069:161a-24: dri ma thams cad rnam par bsal te bde zhing
T02D3069:161a-25: tshim par gyur cig / spos gsol bas bdag dang
T02D3069:161a-26: mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims
T02D3069:161a-28: yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig
T02D3069:161a-29: / me tog phul bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i
T02D3069:161a-30: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
T02D3069:161a-31: dang ldan par gyur cig / mar me phul bas
T02D3069:161a-32: sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal
T02D3069:161a-33: nas / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgron
T02D3069:161a-34: ma dang ldan par gyur cig / bshos dang zhal
T02D3069:161a-35: zas gsol bas sems can thams cad bkres pa'i sdug
T02D3069:161a-36: bsngal bsal nas yid bzhin gyi zas skom dang ldan
T02D3069:161a-37: par gyur cig /'bru rnam pa lnga phul bas sems
T02D3069:161a-38: can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi lo tog 'phel
T02D3069:161a-39: zhing dge ba'i lo tog dus kun du rgyas par
T02D3069:161b-0: gyur cig / spos @161b lnga gsol bas sems can
T02D3069:161b-1: thams cad tshul khrims rnam par dag ste /
T02D3069:161b-2: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur
T02D3069:161b-3: cig / sman lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad
T02D3069:161b-4: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas
T02D3069:161b-5: thugs rje'i sman gyis dug gsum gyi nad las thar
T02D3069:161b-6: bar gyur cig / rin po che sna lnga gsol
T02D3069:161b-7: bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems
T02D3069:161b-8: can thams cad kyi dgos dgu yid bzhin du bskangs
T02D3069:161b-9: nas 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par
T02D3069:161b-10: gyur cig / snying po lnga gsol bas bdag dang
T02D3069:161b-11: sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi de kho
T02D3069:161b-12: na nyid kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur cig
T02D3069:161b-13: / rgyan dang na bza' gsol bas sems can thams
T02D3069:161b-14: cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ngo tsha
T02D3069:161b-15: mkhyen pa'i na bza' dang ldan pa dang byang chub
T02D3069:161b-16: kyi phyogs kyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig /
T02D3069:161b-17: bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang 'phan dang gdugs la
T02D3069:161b-18: sogs pa phul bas bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i ting
T02D3069:161b-19: nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang ldan nas theg pa bla
T02D3069:161b-20: na med pa la gnas par gyur cig / yungs
T02D3069:161b-21: kar gsol bas 'jig rten ji srid gnas pa'i bar
T02D3069:161b-22: du 'jig rten na bzhugs shing sems can gyi don
T02D3069:161b-23: mdzad nas mchod pa'i don du gyur cig / bkra
T02D3069:161b-24: shis phul pas mi dge zhing bkra mi shis pa
T02D3069:161b-25: thams cad bsal nas bu gcig pa'i ma ltar byams
T02D3069:161b-26: pa chen po rgyas nas bkra shis byin che bar
T02D3069:161b-27: gyur cig /'phags pa'i sku gdung rin chen ring bsrel
T02D3069:161b-28: snod // rnying bcos byi dor bgyis shing mchod pa dang //
T02D3069:161b-29: gsar brtsigs mchod cing khrus chab gsol ba dang //
T02D3069:161b-30: bstod dang bskor dang gus pa bgyis pa dang //
T02D3069:161b-31: smon lam zab mo sems yid dang btab pa'i /
T02D3069:161b-32: byin rlabs yon tan khyad par chen po'i mthus //
T02D3069:161b-33: bdag cag yon bdag 'khor bcas thams cad dang //
T02D3069:161b-34: dad mos grogs byed rjes su yi rang rnams //
T02D3069:161b-35: smon lam mthu stobs khyad par chen po yis //
T02D3069:161b-36: dang ba'i yid kyis mchod pa 'di brtsigs pas //
T02D3069:161b-37: des na bdag cag sdig sgrib byang gyur te //
T02D3069:161b-38: bla med byang chub bdag cag myur thob shog / shes rab mchog gis bdag med thugs chud de //
T02D3069:161b-39: ye shes chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi //
T02D3069:162a-0: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos sku @162a * //
T02D3069:162a-2: so so rang rig de la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-3: 'gro ba'i don du dka' ba rnams mdzad de //
T02D3069:162a-4: bsod nams chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi //
T02D3069:162a-5: bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs skur gang snang ba //
T02D3069:162a-6: yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-7: bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i sngon rol nas //
T02D3069:162a-8: sems can don du byang chub thugs bskyed de //
T02D3069:162a-9: spyod pas gzhan gyi don la rab brtson pa //
T02D3069:162a-10: bla med 'bras bu brnyes la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-11: thabs kyis spyod pa mdzad pa mthar phyin cing //
T02D3069:162a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen yongs bskor nas ;
T02D3069:162a-13: / mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul ni rab bstan pa //
T02D3069:162a-14: sku gdung gzhag pa dag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-15: sku gdung phra mor gsil ba'i ring bsrel snod //
T02D3069:162a-16: rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa chos kyi tshul //
T02D3069:162a-17: sems can rnams kyis mchod pa bya ba'i rten //
T02D3069:162a-18: gzugs brnyan nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-19: sngon gyi smon lam chen po'i rgyun mnga' bas //
T02D3069:162a-20: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun te //

T02D3069:162a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ma 'dres chos //
T02D3069:162a-24: thugs rje chen po tshad med rab mnga' bas //
T02D3069:162a-25: 'khor lo char khebs lta bu'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D3069:162a-26: 'bras bu'i chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-27: mi 'jigs bsrung ba med dang bdud las rgyal //
T02D3069:162a-28: tshangs ba'i dbyangs ldan mngon par mkhyen mnga' bas //
T02D3069:162a-29: rdo ring them skas rgyal mtshan dril bu tog /
T02D3069:162a-30: chos sku'i rten du bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-31: chos kyi grags pa ye shes bzhi la sogs //
T02D3069:162a-32: yon tan ngo mtshar nang gi tshogs rdzogs shing //
T02D3069:162a-33: gang gi chos kyi rgyal por mtshan gsol ba //
T02D3069:162a-34: bdag nyid chen po dag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-35: rang bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings de bzhin nyid //
T02D3069:162a-36: spros pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba la //
T02D3069:162a-37: rin chen spras pas mtshan mchog rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D3069:162a-38: 'gro don legs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162a-39: de bzhin sku gdung dbyibs bcas chos sku dag / gang gis mthong thos dran nam reg kyang rung //
T02D3069:162b-0: mtho ris dpal @162b dang thar mchog bde thob pa //
T02D3069:162b-1: yon tan rmang tshogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3069:162b-3: ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku gsum lhun gyis grub //
T02D3069:162b-4: bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das //
T02D3069:162b-5: thugs rje sprul ba'i 'khor ba'i 'dam bskams pa //
T02D3069:162b-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-7: dri med bdud rtsi 'khor ba'i nad rnams 'joms //

T02D3069:162b-9: ye shes nyi mas ma rig mun 'joms pa //
T02D3069:162b-10: 'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-11: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms tshul //
T02D3069:162b-12: bde gshegs rin chen padmo las kyi rtags //
T02D3069:162b-13: rin chen bzhi las mngon du gyur pa'i sku //
T02D3069:162b-14: rigs bzhi'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-15: lho phyogs 'dzam gling rin chen dkyil 'khor na //
T02D3069:162b-16: ye shes dpag yas thugs rjes 'brel pa'i sku //
T02D3069:162b-17: rang byung sprul pa'i mchod rten chen po dang //
T02D3069:162b-18: yid bzhin lhun gyis grub la mchod pa 'bul //

T02D3069:162b-20: thabs kyi bye brag ring bsrel skur bstan pa //
T02D3069:162b-21: dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang //
T02D3069:162b-22: rmad grags chos kyi dbyings la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-23: byang phyogs bsam yas yid bzhin dkyil 'khor na //
T02D3069:162b-24: thabs dang shes rab gsal zhing mchod pa'i gdung //
T02D3069:162b-25: yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang //
T02D3069:162b-26: khams gsum bde rgyas sgron la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-27: shar phyogs lus 'phags ye shes dkyil 'khor na ;
T02D3069:162b-28: / byams pa 'khor ba 'dren mdzad ring bsrel sku //
T02D3069:162b-29: byams ldan bsod nams gter gyi mchod rten dang //
T02D3069:162b-30: mthar legs g-yung drung rdzogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-31: khri 'phang dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi //
T02D3069:162b-32: lus sems tshor dang chos rnams rjes su dran //
T02D3069:162b-33: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid mngon rtogs pa //
T02D3069:162b-34: rig pa'i shes rab bskyed la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:162b-35: khri 'phang gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi //
T02D3069:162b-36: sdig pa mi bskyed mi dge'i chos spong zhing //
T02D3069:162b-37: dge ba'i chos bskyed tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad pa /
T02D3069:162b-38: rtog pa'i bag chags bral la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163a-1: gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi //
T02D3069:163a-2: 'dun dang sems dang dpyod dang brtson 'grus rnams //
T02D3069:163a-3: spong ba'i 'du byed ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis //
T02D3069:163a-4: thogs med 'gro don mdzad la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163a-5: khri 'phang bzhi ba snang ba'i dbang po lnga //

T02D3069:163a-7: shes rab dbang po chos la dbang bsgyur ba //

T02D3069:163a-9: 'gyur med bum rten 'debs pa'i stobs lnga ste //
T02D3069:163a-10: dad dang brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin stobs //
T02D3069:163a-11: shes rab stobs kyis nyon mongs zil gyis non //
T02D3069:163a-12: mthu dbang mngon du gyur la mchod pa 'bul //

T02D3069:163a-16: 'grub 'gyur thogs pa med la mchod pa 'bul //

T02D3069:163a-20: 'phags pa'i lam nas 'jug la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163a-21: srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yi bdag nyid de //

T02D3069:163a-23: dam chos bdud rtsi 'dzin pa'i mchog gyur pa //
T02D3069:163a-24: shes rab don kun rig la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163a-25: 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsum //
T02D3069:163a-26: shes rab spyan ldan thabs chen mngon gzigs te //
T02D3069:163a-27: shes bya'i bag chags sbyangs pas thogs pa med //
T02D3069:163a-28: ye shes phun sum tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163a-29: char khebs skyabs chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de //

T02D3069:163a-33: dad brtson shugs kyis lus ngag sems btud de //

T02D3069:163a-35: 'byung blnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang //
T02D3069:163a-36: sku gdung ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa 'bul //

T02D3069:163a-38: rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis phyi mthar gzhan don mdzad //
T02D3069:163b-0: skye 'gag @163b med pa'i don gyis blo sbyangs pa //
T02D3069:163b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163b-2: rnam grol thar lam mgon du rab brtson pa //
T02D3069:163b-3: zung bzhi yang brgyad rig pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs //
T02D3069:163b-4: rten 'brel don kun rig pas rang sangs rgyas //
T02D3069:163b-5: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163b-6: dge ba bcus bskyed skal ldan sangs rgyas zhing //
T02D3069:163b-7: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis ngan song mtha' spangs shing //
T02D3069:163b-8: rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D3069:163b-9: 'jig rten srung ma'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D3069:163b-10: rdo rings them skas chu srin rgyal mtshan dang //
T02D3069:163b-11: gdugs dang ba dan dar gyi cod phan dang //
T02D3069:163b-12: padma nyi zla sil snyan lha rdzas kyis //
T02D3069:163b-13: tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar dmigs pa dag par mchod //
T02D3069:163b-14: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus bsgyur ba //

T02D3069:163b-21: srid gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam las grol ba dang //
T02D3069:163b-22: 'gro don mdzad pa'i thugs dam bskang slang du //

T02D3069:163b-24: byams pa'i thugs rjes mchod pa bzhes su gsol //

T02D3069:163b-26: spyan drangs phyag bgyis bstod dang bskur ba'i mthus //
T02D3069:163b-27: sngon bsags las kyi sgrib pa kun byang nas //
T02D3069:163b-28: 'gro drug tshogs rdzogs mngon par sangs rgyas shog /'phags pa'i mchod rten la mchod rten aargha gsol ba /
T02D3069:163b-29: mchod rten sku yi cha lugs ni //
T02D3069:163b-30: 'og gi rmang bting ye shes bzhi //
T02D3069:163b-31: gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum //
T02D3069:163b-32: chags med padma'i gdan stengs su //
T02D3069:163b-33: bum pa zlum po chos kyi rje //
T02D3069:163b-35: srog shing drang srong bla na med //
T02D3069:163b-36: 'khor lo bcu gsum ye shes brgyad //
T02D3069:163b-37: 'bar ba rdo rje ye shes lnga //
T02D3069:163b-38: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
T02D3069:164a-0: @164a * // bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas //
T02D3069:164a-1: chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun bzhin du //

T02D3069:164a-5: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //

T02D3069:167b-22: 'gro la phan dang bde slad du //
T02D3069:167b-23: byang chub snying por bzhugs bzhugs su //
T02D3069:167b-24: dngos po kun dang bral ba dang //
T02D3069:167b-25: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02D3069:167b-26: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa //
T02D3069:167b-27: bdag med chos kyi bdag nyid kyis //
T02D3069:167b-28: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa ;
T02D3069:167b-29: / stong nyid rang bzhin thugs bskyed ltar //
T02D3069:167b-30: bdag dang ris mthun gzhan gyis kyang //
T02D3069:167b-31: bla med byang chub sems bskyed bgyi //
T02D3069:167b-32: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin brlabs kyis //
T02D3069:167b-33: sems can thams cad shis par brjod //
T02D3069:167b-34: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin brlabs dang //
T02D3069:167b-35: 'phags pa kun gyi thugs rje dang //
T02D3069:167b-36: chos nyid dag pa'i mthu dang ni //
T02D3069:167b-37: bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis //
T02D3069:167b-38: khams gsum rgyud lnga gnas bzhin //
T02D3069:167b-39: gzugs dang gzugs can ma yin dang //
T02D3069:167b-40: 'du shes med dang yod min dang //
T02D3069:167b-41: sems can rigs rnams ji snyed pas //
T02D3069:167b-42: so so'i skye bor gtogs pa'i sa //
T02D3069:167b-43: sdug bsngal thams cad myur spangs te //
T02D3069:167b-45: nges par legs par rtogs gyur cig /'phags lam brnyes pa thams cad kyis //
T02D3069:167b-46: gong ma'i yon tan mchog thob cing //
T02D3069:167b-47: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi //
T02D3069:168a-1: gzhol gyur cig / sems can dang 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la bsod nams bstab pa /
T02D3069:168a-3: da ltar dus dang phyogs bcu yi //
T02D3069:168a-4: 'jig rten khams na gang bzhugs pa'i //
T02D3069:168a-5: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
T02D3069:168a-6: bsod nams dang ni ye shes tshogs //
T02D3069:168a-7: de yi rgyu dang 'bras bu dang //
T02D3069:168a-8: sbyor ba dang ni dngos dang mjug / sems can kun la bstabs mkhyen ltar //
T02D3069:168a-9: bdag dang sems can kun gyis kyang //
T02D3069:168a-10: rang gi bsod nams ma lus pa //
T02D3069:168a-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas bde ma thob pa'i //
T02D3069:168a-12: sems can rnams la bstab par bgyi //
T02D3069:168a-13: sbyor ba dang ni mthong ba dang //
T02D3069:168a-14: bsgom dang mi slob lam brnyes pa'i //
T02D3069:168a-15: 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams kun la yang //
T02D3069:168a-16: de dag rab tu bstab par bgyi //
T02D3069:168a-17: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba /
T02D3069:168a-18: bla ma'i bla ma dkon mchog dang //
T02D3069:168a-19: mchod rten khyad par 'khor bcas la //
T02D3069:168a-20: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang //
T02D3069:168a-21: yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba dang //
T02D3069:168a-22: skyabs gsol lus phul sems bskyed dang //
T02D3069:168a-23: shis pa brjod cing bstabs pa dang //
T02D3069:168a-24: gzhan yang dge ba ci bsags pa //
T02D3069:168a-25: thams cad bla med byang chub bsngo //
T02D3069:168a-26: des ni sems can thams cad dang //
T02D3069:168a-27: 'phags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis //
T02D3069:168a-28: ye shes sa yi lam gyi mchog /'jug dang gnas dang 'phar ba dang //
T02D3069:168a-29: spyod pa nyid kyi yul rnams ni //
T02D3069:168a-30: go rims bzhin du rab rtogs te //
T02D3069:168a-31: sku gsum mkhyen bzhi'i tshogs rdzogs shing //
T02D3069:168a-32: bla med sangs rgyas grub par smon //
T02D3069:168a-33: 'di bris bsod nams ci mchis pa //
T02D3069:168a-34: khams gsum sems can thams cad dang //
T02D3069:168a-35: rmongs pa bdag gis sdig bgyis pa //
T02D3069:168a-36: thams cad ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D3069:168a-37: 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug
T02D3069:168a-38: tor dri ma med par snang ba'i gzungs bklag cing
T02D3069:168a-39: mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02D3069:168a-40: mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa /
